courses.name: Certificate IV in Kitchen Management (Fast track intensive course)
courses.note: Students will be required to do additional training in order to complete a fast track intensive course.This includes 48 complete food service periods for unit SITHCCC043 - Work effectively as a cook

courses.name: Diploma of Hospitality Management
courses.note: Includes 36 complete service periods for unit SITHIND008 - Work effectively in hospitality service

courses.name: Advanced Diploma of Hospitality Management
courses.note: Includes 36 complete service periods for unit SITHIND008 - Work effectively in hospitality service

courses.name: Certificate IV in Kitchen Management + Advanced Diploma of Hospitality Management
courses.note: These qualifications require students to complete service periods / complete food service periods / complete service periods (shifts).  For more information, please visit the individual courses outline on our website.

courses.name: Diploma of Hospitality Management + Advanced Diploma of Hospitality Management
courses.note: These qualifications require students to complete service periods / complete food service periods / complete service periods (shifts).  For more information, please visit the individual courses outline on our website.
